document.full_text: a five-minute screening test could help detect autism in babies at 12 months of age, giving parents and doctors far more time to intervene, u.s. researchers said thursday.
document.title: simple test helps spot autism in infants: study
lines_and_colors: a five-minute screening test could help detect autism in babies at 12 months of age, giving parents and doctors far more time to intervene, u.s. researchers said thursday.
